[Page Title: French Cuisine, Wine & Cocktails in Charleston SC | La Cave Restaurant]

Quintessential French Elegance

La Cave is an intimate French dining room where a seasonal, ingredient-driven menu sets the tone, complemented by an exceptional selection of French wines, craft cocktails, and whiskies.

A Taste of Provence in Charleston

Seasonal French cooking and understated elegance inspired by the South of France.
The Menu 
Private Events

An elevated backdrop for rehearsal dinners, private brunches, cocktail parties, and beyond.

Located right on King Street, La Cave’s European charm and curated interiors provide a retreat in the heart of downtown Charleston.
Inquire Now 
Savor every moment in classic Provençal style
Learn More

[Page Title: Our Menu - La Cave Restaurant | Charleston SC]

Menu

In the esprit de Provence, La Cave celebrates the rhythm of the seasons through the lens of Chef Alex Eaton. Each dish showcases the Lowcountry’s freshest ingredients, thoughtfully sourced from local farms and purveyors, and paired with organic French wines and garden-driven cocktails—all meant to be shared and savored at a leisurely pace.
Dinner Cocktails Wines & Digestifs

[Page Title: Private Events - La Cave Restaurant | Charleston SC]

Private Events

Private Events

Inspired by the light-soaked villas of the South of France, La Cave provides an elevated backdrop for rehearsal dinners, private brunches, cocktail parties, and beyond. With cozy banquettes and antique mirrors, the lounge evokes classic Provençal style with natural wood finishes, curved light stone walls, organic lavender accents, and olive trees for added charm.
Inquire 
The Space

Featuring a semi-private room surrounded by flowing drapery and full bar, the space is available for partial or full buyouts.

Capacity

Semi-private: Up to 14 guests
Full Buyout: Up to 35 guests seated or 80 standing

Food & Beverage

Menus are fully customizable, pulling options from La Cave’s French-inspired offerings, such as caviar profiteroles, filet tartine, and oysters on the half shell, or create your own with the help of our chef and events team.
Inquire 
Inquire below for your private event at La Cave
